bioghist.p: The Foundation for the Blind (Juniata County, Pennsylvania) was a society organized for the benefit of blind residents of the local area. In 1954-1955, the president of the Foundation was Nelson Lloyd. The group met in the homes of the members or in the Presbyterian Church in Mifflintown, Pennsylvania.

scopecontent.p: This volume contains minutes of four meetings of the Foundation for the Blind, held between 1954 and 1955. The minutes largely relate to fund drives, movie screenings, and home visits to the blind.
